name: Rokto Bondhon – Blood Donation Platform
description: A user-friendly Blood Donation Application built with the MERN stack. The platform connects donors with those in need, ensuring a smooth and efficient blood donation process.
features: User Registration & Authentication – Secure login for admin, donors, and volunteers.
Blood Donation Requests – Users can request blood by specifying their blood group, district, and upazila.
Donor Management – Admins and volunteers can manage donor profiles efficiently.
Funding System – Users can donate funds to support the organization (Stripe integration).
Role-Based Access Control – Different roles: Admin, Volunteer, and Donor.
Interactive Alerts – Notify users with toast messages and alerts for requests, approvals, and donations.
challenges: Implementing role-based access control with different permissions.
Displaying dynamic dashboard data such as total users, funding amounts, and blood donation requests for Admin and Volunteers.
Ensuring secure authentication and data protection.
futurePlans: Building a dynamic 'Emergency Blood Needed' feature where users can post urgent blood requirements.
Adding multilingual support to make the platform accessible to a wider audience.
Add an AI-powered chatbot for instant assistance and engagement.

name: RaceConnect – Marathon Management System
description: A comprehensive platform for organizing and managing marathon events. It connects event organizers and participants, allowing streamlined registration, event creation, and dashboard management.
features: Personalized Dashboard – Manage marathon registrations, view applied events, and track updates.
Real-Time Countdown Timer – Visually engaging timer with dynamic updates.
Sorting and Filtering Options – Easily sort marathons by date and filter by marathon title.
Secure Authentication – JWT-based authentication for data security.
Responsive Design – Optimized for mobile, tablet and desktop users.
challenges: Handling large datasets for marathon registrations.
futurePlans: Integrating live tracking for marathon participants.
Adding a forum section for runners to share their experiences.
Implementing a reward and achievement system to motivate participants.

name: Crowdcube – Crowd Funding Platform
description: A dynamic crowdfunding platform designed to help individuals, startups, and creative thinkers turn their ideas into reality by connecting them with supporters.
features: User-Friendly Campaign Management – Create, update, and manage campaigns easily.
Personalized Dashboards – Track campaigns, donations, and fundraising progress.
Sort by Minimum Donation – A button on the all campaigns page to sort campaigns based on their minimum donation amount.
Dynamic Theme Options – Switch between light and dark themes.
Comprehensive Campaign Insights – Showcase details like title, images, donation goals, and deadlines.
challenges: Designing a responsive and accessible theme toggle system.
Implementing a responsive theme toggle feature.
futurePlans: Introducing social media sharing options for campaigns.
Adding a reward-based system for donors.
Expanding campaign categories for more diverse funding opportunities.

name: Winter Donation – Winter Clothing Donation Platform
description: A platform for collecting and distributing winter clothing in Bangladesh, enabling individuals and organizations to donate and support those in need during colder months.
features: User Authentication – Secure login and registration for users.
Campaigns – Users can view and donate to various winter clothing campaigns.
Responsive Design – Fully responsive, mobile-first design for accessibility.
Animations – Beautiful animations using animate.css and on-scroll effects powered by react-intersection-observer to enhance user experience.
challenges: Implementing smooth and performant animations that work well across devices using animate.css and react-intersection-observer.
Ensuring responsive design with mobile-first approach for a seamless user experience on all screen sizes.
Integrating Firebase Authentication securely and handling user sessions effectively.
Overcoming design challenges related to color schemes and overall site aesthetics to create an appealing user interface.
futurePlans: Integrate backend services to support real-time campaign data and user donations.
Add multilingual support to reach a wider audience.
Implement donation tracking and user dashboards for better engagement.
Enhance accessibility compliance to ensure the platform is usable by everyone.

name: Gadget Heaven – E-commerce Platform
description: A frontend e-commerce platform for buying gadgets, featuring cart and wishlist. Built using React and Context API with data persistence via localStorage.
features: Product Browsing – Explore gadgets with detailed information.
Cart Management – Add items to cart and track total cost.
Wishlist – Save favorite gadgets and easily move them to cart.
Real-Time Stock Updates – Instantly see product availability.
Purchase Confirmation – Modal displays success message and clears cart.
challenges: Managing global state efficiently using Context API across multiple components.
Implementing persistent cart and wishlist functionalities with localStorage.
Designing responsive UI for various devices while maintaining visual consistency.
futurePlans: Integrate payment gateway for real-time purchases.
Add user authentication for personalized experience.
Implement product filtering and sorting for better usability.

name: BPL-DREAM 11 – Select Your Dream XI!
description: A frontend cricket team management app where users build their dream BPL XI while staying within budget and player constraints. Built with React and Tailwind CSS.
features: Player Selection – Pick players across categories with budget and team limits.
Dynamic Feedback – Toast notifications for selections, removals, and warnings.
Budget Tracking – Real-time updates on budget usage.
Responsive UI – Fully responsive design for all devices.
Interactive UX – Immediate visual feedback on user actions.
challenges: Ensuring accurate real-time budget calculation during team selection.
Designing a user-friendly layout for managing team constraints.
Maintaining responsiveness and consistency across device sizes.
futurePlans: Add player performance stats and live updates.
Introduce user login and save team progress.
Enable team sharing or competition among users.
